summary: "The Inside Man" is based on a real-life incident during the days of the Cold War when a Soviet submarine was spotted in Swedish waters.
cast: Dennis Hopper|Hardy Krüger|Gösta Ekman|Kåre Mölder|David Wilson|Celia Gregory|Lena Endre|Per Mattsson|Torsten Wahlund|János Herskó|Leif Ahrle|Lillemor 'Lill' Lindfors|Charlie Elvegård|Jan Hermfelt|Carl-Ivar Nilsson|Wallis Grahn|Ulf Hasseltorp|Gustaf Elander|Sten Johan Hedman|Björn Wallmark|Kurt Diop|Sven Melander|Inga-Lill Åhström|Annmari Kastrup|Daniel Epstein|Gunnel Eriksson
title: Agente invisible
